act_info.full_title: Nikola Tesla Day Act, 2021, S.O. 2021, c. 29

content.content:
1 July 10 in each year is proclaimed as Nikola Tesla Day. 2 Omitted
(provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 3 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
